name: n8n-nodes-base.asanaTrigger
description: Starts the workflow when Asana events occur.

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The resource ID to subscribe to. The resource can be a task or project.

properties.name: workspace
properties.description: The workspace ID the resource is registered under. This is only required if you want to allow overriding existing webhooks. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
